translations: n．嘲笑者，讥讽者：对某人或某事表示轻蔑、不敬或嘲笑的人。
· Scoffers dismissed his invention as a useless gadget.
嘲笑者认为他的发明是一个无用的小玩意。

sentences.sentence: Knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts.
sentences.translation: 第一要紧的，该知道在末世必有好讥诮的人，随从自己的私欲出来讥诮说。

sentences.sentence: Scoffers may think the trading of carbon emissions cannot be taken seriously as a proper commodity market.
sentences.translation: 嘲笑者也许认为碳排放交易不可能被当作一个真正的大宗商品市场认真对待。

sentences.sentence: Knowing this first, that in the last days there shall come deceitful scoffers, walking after their own lusts.
sentences.translation: 首先你们该知道：在末日要出现一些爱嘲笑戏弄，按照自己的私欲生活的人。
